original_text: Those who led the way rebuked him and told him to be quiet, but he shouted all the more, “Son of David, have mercy on me!”
korean_text: 앞서 가는 자들이 그를 꾸짖어 잠잠하라 하되 그가 더욱 크게 소리 질러 다윗의 자손이여 나를 불쌍히 여기소서 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Those who led the way rebuked him
and told him to be quiet
but he shouted all the more
Son of David, have mercy on me!
